author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
Geant4 10.6 provides an option "general process" for gamma tracking. This option assume giving some CPU speed-up. In This PR necessary modifications inside CMSSW are introduced in order to utilize such option. By default it is disabled, so not difference in regression is expected for this PR. Also a minor code clean-up is done: removed unused headers, use log::Verbatim instead of log::Info in PhysicsList library.

#### PR validation:
private

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR: no
title: Added Geant4 "general process" option
